tool_metadata.name: rmms_code_tool
tool_metadata.description: AI-powered code editor for RMMS - create and manage Python/C# codes for automation and calculations
tool_metadata.author: MetisAgent3

capabilities.name: list_codes
capabilities.description: List all codes. Parameters: company_id (REQUIRED int), language (optional: python/csharp)

capabilities.name: get_code
capabilities.description: Get code by name. Parameters: company_id (REQUIRED int), code_name (REQUIRED string)

capabilities.name: create_code
capabilities.description: Create new Python/C# code. Parameters: company_id (REQUIRED int), name (REQUIRED string), code (REQUIRED string - the actual code content), language (optional: python/csharp, default python), description (optional string)

capabilities.name: update_code
capabilities.description: Update existing code. Parameters: company_id (REQUIRED int), code_name (REQUIRED string), code (optional new code content), description (optional string)

capabilities.name: delete_code
capabilities.description: Delete a code. Parameters: company_id (REQUIRED int), code_name (REQUIRED string)

capabilities.name: validate_code
capabilities.description: Validate code syntax locally. Parameters: code (REQUIRED string), language (optional: python/csharp)

capabilities.name: execute_code
capabilities.description: Execute code on server. Parameters: company_id (REQUIRED int), code_name (REQUIRED string), context (optional object with input variables), enable_logging (optional bool), watchdog_timeout (optional int ms)

capabilities.name: get_template
capabilities.description: Get code template. Parameters: language (optional: python/csharp)

capabilities.name: get_examples
capabilities.description: Get example codes. Parameters: language (optional: python/csharp)
